Sponsored by NetJets: When Does It Make Sense to Take a Private Jet?
The travel industry has been hit hard by the COVID-19 pandemic. Airline passenger levels have fallen and many air carrier have reduced schedules, canceled routes and taken aircraft out of service.
It’s no wonder a lot of fliers are reconsidering the many advantages of traveling by private aircraft, including the ability to fly to locations with limited or nonexistent airline service. Find out how we stack up against the competition with this free infographic.
Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/services/maintenance-and-service-plans/maintenance-service-plan-propulsion?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=newsletter]]> What is Network Intrusion Detection and Monitoring?
Cybersecurity is a top priority as connected aircraft have become the norm in business aviation. Flight departments, pilots and passengers need to be confident the onboard network is protected from cyberattacks and other intrusions.
Network intrusion detection and network monitoring applications are as essential in the air as they are on the ground. These capabilities play a critical role in any integrated cybersecurity strategy as business aircraft operators strive to safeguard connected devices and the data that flows constantly in both directions between the airplane and the ground.
Read more <[[https://www.aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/blogs/2020/08/what-is-network-intrusion-detection?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=newsletter-aug]]> GoDirect Router Sets New Standard for Aircraft Manufacturers
